mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,shuji.yonghu_id as shujiYonghuId ,shuji.shuji_name as shujiName ,shuji.shuji_photo as shujiPhoto ,shuji.shuji_types as shujiTypes ,shuji.shuji_file as shujiFile ,shuji.shuji_music as shujiMusic ,shuji.shuji_clicknum as shujiClicknum ,shuji.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,shuji.shuji_delete as shujiDelete ,shuji.shuji_content as shujiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shuji_liuyan a left JOIN shuji shuji ON a.shuji_id = shuji.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shuji_id = #{params.shujiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} or shuji.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.shuji_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shujiLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.shuji_id IS NOT NULL
and shuji.shuji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shujiName},'%')
and shuji.shuji_types = #{params.shujiTypes}
and shuji.shuji_music like CONCAT('%',#{params.shujiMusic},'%')
and shuji.shuji_clicknum >= #{params.shujiClicknumStart}
and shuji.shuji_clicknum <= #{params.shujiClicknumEnd}
and shuji.shuji_clicknum = #{params.shujiClicknum}
and shuji.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and shuji.shuji_delete >= #{params.shujiDeleteStart}
and shuji.shuji_delete <= #{params.shujiDeleteEnd}
and shuji.shuji_delete = #{params.shujiDelete}
and shuji.shuji_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shujiContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
